title: Rede Xistv
text:
Rede Xistv is a Brazilian TV station, with headquarters in <a href="Santana%20de%20Parnaiba">Santana de Parnaiba</a>, a city in the state of <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Paulo%20%28state%29">São Paulo</a>.
History.
The station was founded in 2005 accordingly with <a href="Lei%20do%20Cabo">Lei do Cabo</a> and currently broadcasts Rede Xistv's own productions through more than 60 channels, always in <a href="High-definition%20television">HD</a>.
Rde Xistv has had its trademark protected since 2004 by <a href="National%20Industrial%20Property%20Institute%20%28Brazil%29">INPI</a>.
The first programs were televised sports and local news. Now the focus is on the regional identity of the network, with coverage of local and regional events and <a href="news">news</a>.
